name: UltraComfort Office Chair
description: An ergonomic chair with lumbar support, adjustable height, and breathable mesh backing for maximum comfort during long work hours.

name: Eco-Friendly Bamboo Pen
description: Sleek and sustainable, this pen is made from 100% bamboo with smooth ink flow for a delightful writing experience.

name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Compact and noise-canceling earbuds with a long battery life, delivering high-quality sound on the go.

name: Hydration Tracking Water Bottle
description: A BPA-free water bottle with a built-in sensor that tracks daily hydration and syncs with a smartphone app.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Modern desk lamp with adjustable brightness and color temperature, controlled via app or voice commands.
